sourcesContent:
Personal Particular (Summary)

Stop Payment active
{{ nsman.personalInfo.nric }} {{ nsman.serviceInfo.currRank }}
{{ nsman.personalInfo.fullName.toUpperCase() }}
{{ nsman.serviceInfo.currTOS }} ({{ nsman.personalInfo.sex }}) {{ nsman.contactInfo.phoneNo }}
{{ nsman.contactInfo.email }}
Caution , Alert & Block
{{ nsman.bankAccountInfo.bankName }} {{ nsman.bankAccountInfo.bankAcctNo }}
({{ nsman.bankAccountInfo.lastUpdatedDate }})
NOA{{ latestNOAInfo.yrOfIncome.substring(2) }} (DD-MM-YYYY)
Trade {{ latestNOAInfo.tradeIncome | currency:'SGD' : '' }}
Emp. {{ latestNOAInfo.empIncome | currency:'SGD' : '' }}
Nett Emp. {{ latestNOAInfo.nettEmpIncome | currency:'SGD' : '' }}
CPF Relevant Month: {{ latestCpfInfo.at(0).relevantContributionMonth.toLocaleString("en-US", { minimumIntegerDigits: 2 }) }}-{{ latestCpfInfo.at(0).relevantContributionYear }}
{{ item.csn }}
get company name
{{ item.monthlySalary | currency:'SGD' : '' }} ({{ latestCpfInfo.at(0).relevantContributionMonth.toLocaleString("en-US", { minimumIntegerDigits: 2 }) }}-{{ latestCpfInfo.at(0).relevantContributionYear }})
{{ item.sector }}
Address {{ nsman.addressInfo.blkNo }} {{ nsman.addressInfo.hseNo }} {{ nsman.addressInfo.street }} S({{ nsman.addressInfo.postalDistrict }}) Date of Birth {{ nsman.personalInfo.birthDate }} Highest Standard Passed {{ nsman.personalInfo.hsp }} Home {{ nsman.contactInfo.homeTelNo }} Highest Standard Attained {{ nsman.personalInfo.hsa }} Office {{ nsman.contactInfo.officeTelNo }}
Current Effective Date Previous Effective Date Rank {{ currentRankInfo.rank }} {{ currentRankInfo.rankDate }} {{ previousRankInfo.rank }} {{ previousRankInfo.rankDate }} TOS Code {{ currentTOSInfo.tosCode }} {{ currentTOSInfo.tosDateFrom }} {{ previousTOSInfo.tosCode }} {{ previousTOSInfo.tosDateFrom }} Vocation Code {{ currentVocationInfo.code }} {{ currentVocationInfo.vocationDate }} {{ previousVocationInfo.code }} {{ previousVocationInfo.vocationDate }} NS Appointment {{ currentApptInfo.appt }} {{ currentApptInfo.apptDate }} {{ previousApptInfo.appt }} {{ previousApptInfo.apptDate }} Service {{ currentDivisionInfo.serviceType }} {{ currentDivisionInfo.serviceTypeDate }} {{ previousDivisionInfo.serviceType }} {{ previousDivisionInfo.serviceTypeDate }} Division {{ currentDivisionInfo.parentUnit }} {{ currentDivisionInfo.parentUnitDate }} {{ previousDivisionInfo.parentUnit }} {{ previousDivisionInfo.parentUnitDate }} Unit {{ currentUnitInfo.unit }} {{ currentUnitInfo.unitDate }} {{ previousUnitInfo.unit }} {{ previousUnitInfo.unitDate }}
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { EnqNSman, NSmanApptInfo, NSmanCpfInfo, NSmanDivisionHistoryInfo, NSmanNOAInfo, NSmanRankInfo, NSmanTOSInfo, NSmanUnitHistoryInfo, NSmanVocationHistoryInfo } from '../../model/nsman.model'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { CABService } from 'app/enquiry/caution-alert-block/service/cab.service'; import { CABIndicators } from 'app/enquiry/caution-alert-block/model/cab.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-expanded-particulars', templateUrl: './nsman-expanded-particulars.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-expanded-particulars.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanExpandedParticularsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsman: EnqNSman; displayNsmanCabDialog: any = { display: false }; placeholder = [{ pTableNeedsThisToDisplayData: "" }]; dateFormat = "DD-MM-YYYY"; isStopPaymentActive = false; cpfIndex = 0; latestCpfInfo: NSmanCpfInfo[] = []; latestNOAInfo: NSmanNOAInfo = {}; // ns particulars currentRankInfo: NSmanRankInfo = {}; previousRankInfo: NSmanRankInfo = {}; currentTOSInfo: NSmanTOSInfo = {}; previousTOSInfo: NSmanTOSInfo = {}; currentApptInfo: NSmanApptInfo = {}; previousApptInfo: NSmanApptInfo = {}; currentUnitInfo: NSmanUnitHistoryInfo = {}; previousUnitInfo: NSmanUnitHistoryInfo = {}; currentVocationInfo: NSmanVocationHistoryInfo = {}; previousVocationInfo: NSmanVocationHistoryInfo = {}; currentDivisionInfo: NSmanDivisionHistoryInfo = {}; previousDivisionInfo: NSmanDivisionHistoryInfo = {}; // cab variables nric = ''; highlightAlert = false; highlightBlock = false; highlightCaution = false; cabIndicators: CABIndicators; constructor( private cabService: CABService, public dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.nric = this.nsman.personalInfo.nric; this.isStopPaymentActive = true; // to change this.initSummaryInfo(); this.initNsInfo(); this.setCabFlags(); } initSummaryInfo(): void { if (this.nsman != null) { if (this.nsman.cpfContributionInfo.length > 0) { for (let i = 0; i < this.nsman.cpfContributionInfo.length; i++) { if (i === 0) { // capture cpf contribution made in the latest month and year this.latestCpfInfo.push(this.nsman.cpfContributionInfo.at(i)); } else { // capture subsequent contributions made in the latest month and year if ((this.latestCpfInfo.at(0).relevantContributionMonth === this.nsman.cpfContributionInfo.at(i).relevantContributionMonth) && (this.latestCpfInfo.at(0).relevantContributionYear === this.nsman.cpfContributionInfo.at(i).relevantContributionYear)) { this.latestCpfInfo.push(this.nsman.cpfContributionInfo.at(i)); } } } } // calculate month salary this.latestCpfInfo.forEach(x => x.monthlySalary = x.ordinaryWage/12); if (this.nsman.noaInfo.length > 0) { // capture noa info in the latest month and year this.latestNOAInfo = this.nsman.noaInfo.at(0); // calculate nett emp income this.latestNOAInfo.nettEmpIncome = this.latestNOAInfo.tradeIncome + this.latestNOAInfo.empIncome; } } } initNsInfo(): void { if (this.nsman.rankInfo.length > 0) { this.currentRankInfo = this.nsman.rankInfo.at(0); if (this.nsman.rankInfo.length > 1) { this.previousRankInfo = this.nsman.rankInfo.at(1); } } if (this.nsman.tosInfo.length > 0) { this.currentTOSInfo = this.nsman.tosInfo.at(0); if (this.nsman.tosInfo.length > 1) { this.previousTOSInfo = this.nsman.tosInfo.at(1); } } if (this.nsman.apptInfo.length > 0) { this.currentApptInfo = this.nsman.apptInfo.at(0); if (this.nsman.apptInfo.length > 1) { this.previousApptInfo = this.nsman.apptInfo.at(1); } } if (this.nsman.unitHistoryInfo.length > 0) { this.currentUnitInfo = this.nsman.unitHistoryInfo.at(0); if (this.nsman.unitHistoryInfo.length > 1) { this.previousUnitInfo = this.nsman.unitHistoryInfo.at(1); } } if (this.nsman.vocationHistoryInfo.length > 0) { this.currentVocationInfo = this.nsman.vocationHistoryInfo.at(0); if (this.nsman.vocationHistoryInfo.length > 1) { this.previousVocationInfo = this.nsman.vocationHistoryInfo.at(1); } } if (this.nsman.divisionHistoryInfo.length > 0) { this.currentDivisionInfo = this.nsman.divisionHistoryInfo.at(0); if (this.nsman.divisionHistoryInfo.length > 1) { this.previousDivisionInfo = this.nsman.divisionHistoryInfo.at(1); } } } setCabFlags(): void { this.cabService.getCABIndicators(this.nric).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data) { this.cabIndicators = resp.body.data; } }); setTimeout(() => { this.highlightAlert = this.cabIndicators.isAlertEnabledInd === 'Y'; this.highlightBlock = this.cabIndicators.isBlockEnabledInd === 'Y'; this.highlightCaution = this.cabIndicators.hasCautionRemarkInd === 'Y'; }, 1000); } onOpenCabDialog(nric: string): void { this.nric = nric; this.displayNsmanCabDialog.display = true; } onClose(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = false; this.setCabFlags(); } showPreviousCpfRecord(): void { if (this.cpfIndex > 0) { this.cpfIndex--; } } showNextCpfRecord(): void { if (this.cpfIndex < this.latestCpfInfo.length - 1) { this.cpfIndex++; } } }
